### Overview of logical operators


* `==` - equal
* `!=` - not equal
* `<` - less than
* `<=` - less than or equal
* `>` - greater than
* `>=` - greater than or equal
* `|` - or
* `&` - and
* `!` - not
* `%in%` - is in the set
